attributes.description:
MKR AUTO SALES
2011 A4 Audi 1.8T (B8) Ambition for Sale!!!
Visit us at 495 Cape Road, Westering, Port Elizabeth and Plot 2704 Dyke Road, Algoa Park Port Elizabeth, and speak to us for the friendliest service and the best deals in town!
Features:
Aircon
Airbags
Power Steering
Alarm/Central Locking
Electric Windows
ABS Braking System
Electric Mirrors
Beautiful Cloth Interior
Factory Fitted Audio System
Service History
Recently Serviced
234060kms
Awesome Vehicle!
On special now for just R129990.00!!!
Trade-ins welcomed
Financing is available with all major banks to creditworthy clients only
1 or 2 Year Warranty Options Available
Price excludes on-road charges
Vehicles transported countrywide at an additional cost
Vehicles Wanted For Cash Daily
Cars, Bakkies, SUVs, Panel Vans, D/Cabs and Kombis
Change Of Ownership Done Immediately
We Buy and Sell Vehicles 365 Days A Year In And Around P.E Area
Vehicles bought with immediate EFT payment
Wide variety of cars to choose from
Spotters fees paid on successful referrals

Not only is the 1.2 Lux the most attractive Hatchback around, but it’s also an ideal vehicle with all the bells and whistles. The Datsun GO  was designed specifically to cause a stare on the road. 

All our Pre-Owned Vehicles undergo a stringent Multi-Point Check and Dekra Roadworthy before Delivery. 

We Deliver Countrywide l Trade-ins Accepted l Finance also Available with all major Banks and a Test Drive is a must. Price Excludes License Registration l Administration l Delivery, and on the Road Fees.

attributes.description: For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252552. The Next-Generation Mazda3 hatchback strikes you with its powerful, seductive presence and strong sporty appeal. It is designed to make you feel you’re looking at a work of art – not just a car. The way light plays on its flowing lines gives the impression that it is moving, even when standing still. We do a 101 Quality check on every vehicle and we do Roadworthy upon delivery.
